## About the package

This package is a wrapper around [postcodes.io](http://postcodes.io/) which is a free Postcode lookup API and geocoder for the UK.

## Install the package

This package is currently uploaded only to GitHub. To install it use the following commands:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
if (!require("devtools")) install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("erzk/PostcodesioR")
```

## Usage examples

First load the package after installation:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(PostcodesioR)
```
